html:
Nov 12 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Accor, Stratec SE and Virgin Money UK Plc, on Friday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Accor ACCP.PA: Berenberg raises to hold from sell

* Azimut AZMT.MI: Kepler Cheuvreux raises to buy from hold

* BBVA BBVA.MC: Morgan Stanley raises to overweight from equal-weight

* Stratec SE SBSG.DE: Kepler Cheuvreux cuts to hold from buy

* Virgin Money UK Plc VMUK.L: Goldman Sachs raises to neutral rating


Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Friday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* 4Imprint FOUR.L: HSBC raises target price to 2545p from 2175p
